scripts.test-unit: cross-env TEST_BROWSER_DRIVER=puppeteer MOCHA_TIMEOUT=150000 meteor test --exclude-archs web.browser.legacy,web.cordova --no-release-check --once --driver-package meteortesting:mocha --port 3100
scripts.test-integration: cross-env METEOR_NO_RELEASE_CHECK=1 TEST_BROWSER_DRIVER=puppeteer meteor test --full-app --once --driver-package meteortesting:mocha --port 3100
scripts.test-acceptance-development-single: testcafe chrome tests/*.testcafe.js -t "Test that sign up and sign out work"
scripts.test-acceptance-ci: testcafe chrome:headless tests/*.testcafe.js -q --app "meteor npm run start"
scripts.test-all: meteor reset && meteor npm run lint && meteor npm run unimported && meteor npm run test-unit && meteor npm run test-integration && meteor npm run test-acceptance-ci
